name: @weco/dotorg
description: Products and services relating to wellcomecollection.org.

scripts.build-webapps: echo '@weco/content @weco/identity' | xargs -n 1 | xargs -I% yarn workspace % run build
scripts.test:common: echo "⭕️ Running common tests..." && cd common && NODE_ENV=test jest --no-cache && echo "✅️ common tests finished"
scripts.test:content: echo "⭕️ Running content tests..." && cd content/webapp && NODE_ENV=test jest --no-cache && echo "✅️ content tests finished"
scripts.test:identity: echo "⭕️ Running identity tests..." && cd identity/webapp && NODE_ENV=test jest --no-cache && echo "✅️ content tests finished"
scripts.test:playwright: echo "⭕️ Running playwright tests..." && cd playwright && PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=https://www-stage.wellcomecollection.org yarn test && echo "✅️ playwright tests finished"
scripts.test:playwright:mobile: echo "⭕️ Running playwright mobile tests..." && cd playwright && PLAYWRIGHT_BASE_URL=https://www-stage.wellcomecollection.org NODE_ENV=test platform=mobile yarn test && echo "✅️ playwright mobile tests finished"
scripts.test:all:unit: yarn test:common && yarn test:content && yarn test:identity

author: digital@wellcomecollection.org
